content: top down and increases 4 stitches lace repeat every other row to the edging 2 it is helpful to place markers before the center budding lace repeat chart 2 stitch and the last 2 border stitches as well work row 1 6 for pattern instructions inside as to hang a safety pin at the edge to mark brackets are worked one additional time with each beginning of odd numbered row repeat stitch count is for first repeat 3 nupps are made by loosely working k1 yo k1 row 1 rs k2 *yo k3 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk yo k1 into a stitch to increase 5 stitches on k1 1 time k2 yo * k1 repeat between *s k2 the next row purl those 5 stitches together it 31 sts is important to work the nupp loosely all even row ws k2 purl to last 2 sts k2 4 lace can be worked from written instructions or row 3 k2 *yo k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k1 yo charts ssk k1 1 time k2tog yo k1 yo * k1 repeat 5 wraps-per-inch wpi is a way to measure yarn between *s k2 35 sts size without stretching wrap yarn around a row 5 k2 *yo k3 yo sk2p yo k3 yo sk2p 1 ruler for 1 2 5cm and count the strands time yo k3 yo * k1 repeat between *s k2 39 sts instructions cast-on shawl can be started with the garter stitch tab or work row 1 6 14 times total 195 sts start lily any ordinary cast-on of the valley border garter stitch tab lily of the valley border charts 3a b c & d begin at center back neck with provisional cast-on at center stitch lace reverses to form a mirror using crochet hook and waste yarn chain 4 with image see note 3 for nupp information be careful shawl yarn and needles knit up 2 sts in 2 back not to include yo s on either side of nupp when loops of chain working p5tog row 1 6 knit row 1 rs k2 *yo knit to marker yo * k1 row 7 k2 rotate rectangle to pick up and knit 1 repeat between *s k2 199 sts stitch in each of 3 garter stitch ridges on side all even row ws k2 purl across to last 2 sts edge of tab remove waste yarn from 2 cast-on working p5tog for nupps k2 stitches place stitches on needles and k2 7 row 3 k2 yo k2tog k5 yo nupp yo k1 sk2p sts start budding lace beginning k5 yo nupp yo k1 to 8 sts before marker ssk k6 yo k1 yo k6 k2tog k1 yo nupp yo ordinary cast-on k5 sk2p k1 yo nupp yo k5 to last 4 sts cast on 5 sts ssk yo k2 203 sts row 1 & 2 knit row 5 k2 yo k1 k2tog k4 yo nupp yo k2 row 3 k1 inc1 knit into front and back
